snippet.title: 123 Kids Fun Flashcards - Android App for toddlers and preschoolers
snippet.description:
Fun educational game for your toddlers and preschoolers (ages 2 - 6) to start their adventure with the words.

Our app have 132 Flashcards with great sounds and animations in 11 categories (fruits, furniture, insects, vehicles, cutlery and dishes, clothes, vegetables, animals, bathroom).

This app is designed for preschoolers - no confusing menus or navigation.

It's an adorable App for children to learn basic English words.

You will also find there a Quiz:
- four 22-level quizzing with sound, 
- easy to control, 
- easy to understand, 
- simple result page, 
- score.

---

More videos
